ing: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAMÂ®), grated
des: "This got me first place in a SpamÂ® 'cookoff' that a local TV station held. They are fast and easy hors d'oeuvres and are always a hit during Sunday football!"
ins:
Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix together the meat, Cheddar cheese, baking mix, water, and cayenne in a large bowl. Form the mix into 1-inch balls and place on a greased baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm.
